user.title: Set up FanSync BLE
user.description: Select your fan from the list if discovered, or enter its BLE address manually. If nothing appears, ensure Bluetooth is available and the fan is powered on and nearby. Configure these device options now; you can change them later in Options.

data.has_light: This fan has a built-in light
data.turn_on_speed: Default fan speed for turn on (1=low, 2=medium, 3=high)

error.no_devices_found: No FanSync devices discovered. Make sure Bluetooth is enabled, the fan is on and within range, then try again.
error.bluetooth_unavailable: Bluetooth is unavailable in this Home Assistant instance. Ensure the host has a working Bluetooth adapter or use a Bluetooth Proxy.
